page.title: 16Laceby Acres-hobby survey
page.content:
A hobby is something you do in your spare time.Here is a table of the most popular hobbies of a class of 11 year olds. Boys. Girls. Sports 21% Swimming 35% Watching TV 21% Dancing 21% Football 21% Ice Skating 21% Cycling 14% Knitting 14% Badminton 7% Playing with dolls 7% Stamp Collecting 7% Running 7% Reading 7% Squash 7% Computing 7% Cycling 7% Cricket 7% Watching TV 7%
The most popular hobbis with the boys are sport,watching television and football.With the girls it is swimming.
